about_the_game:
Welcome to another installment of the Voidwalkers' journey!

Outpost Charlie has finally been breached by the realm of the dead. The entities of The Void have started the process of turning the land into a toxic wasteland.

You and your team have been tasked with holding the line until evacuation procedures can be completed. You will be given a device that projects a safe zone that will keep you safe from the toxins.

The undead will do whatever they can to destroy your safety. You must defend the device for as long as possible!

content_descriptors.notes: There is extreme violence and gore in this game. You shoot zombies. Zombies can be dismembered. There is a lot of blood when zombies are shot.

detailed_description:
Welcome to another installment of the Voidwalkers' journey!

Outpost Charlie has finally been breached by the realm of the dead. The entities of The Void have started the process of turning the land into a toxic wasteland.

You and your team have been tasked with holding the line until evacuation procedures can be completed. You will be given a device that projects a safe zone that will keep you safe from the toxins.

The undead will do whatever they can to destroy your safety. You must defend the device for as long as possible!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device
